original_text: But I have something to say against you. You loved me very much when you first believed in me. You do not love me as much now.
korean_text: 그러나 너를 책망할 것이 있나니 너의 처음 사랑을 버렸느니라

sentences.original_text: But I have something to say against you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 내가 너에 대해 할 말이 있다.

sentences.original_text: when you first believed in me.
You do not love me as much now.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이제 나를 그렇게 많이 사랑하지 않는다.
